text: Phil Lord and Chris Miller (Phil: born April 21, 1977 in Miami, Florida, Chris: born September 23, 1975 in Everett, Washington) are American movie and television writers, producers, directors, actors and former animators. They are known for directing Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs, 21 Jump Street, The Lego Movie, and 22 Jump Street. ==Other websites== * * Category:Duos Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Florida Category:Movie producers from Florida Category:American television writers Category:Writers from Miami Category:Actors from Miami Category:Actors from Washington (state) Category:Screenwriters from Florida
title: Phil Lord and Chris Miller
